      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Bathroom - Word Knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">The Bathroom - Word Knowledge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Badezimmer - Wort-Wissen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Salle de bains - La Connaissance de Mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Banheiro - Conhecimento Da Palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Stanza da bagno - Conoscenza Di Parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το λουτρό - γνώση του Word</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cuarto de baño - Conocimiento De la Palabra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can check yourself to see whether you learned the bathroom words you studied in the previous exercise, The Bathroom - Words.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can check yourself to see whether you learned the bathroom words you studied in the previous exercise, The Bathroom - Words. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 4 - How Do You Live?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">living</string>
            <string language="sv">bathroom</string>
            <string language="sv">housing</string>
            <string language="sv">flat</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">living</string>
            <string language="en">bathroom</string>
            <string language="en">housing</string>
            <string language="en">flat</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie sich überprüfen, um zu sehen, 
ob Sie die Badezimmerwörter erlernten, die Sie in der vorhergehenden 
Übung studierten, das Badezimmer - Wörter. Safir - Englisch 
und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 4 - wie leben Sie?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez vous contrôler pour voir 
si vous avez appris les mots de salle de bains que vous avez étudiés
dans l'exercice précédent, la salle de bains - mots. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 4 - comment 
vivez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode verificar-se para ver se você 
aprendeu as palavras que do banheiro você estudou no exercício 
precedente, o banheiro - palavras. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 4 - como você vive?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete controllarsi per vedere se abbiate 
imparato le parole che della stanza da bagno avete studiato 
nell'esercitazione precedente, la stanza da bagno - parole. 
Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 4 - 
come vivete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να ελεγχθείτε για να δείτε εάν
μάθατε τις λέξεις λουτρών που μελετήσατε στην προηγούμενη 
άσκηση, το λουτρό - λέξεις. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 4 - πώς 
ζείτε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede controlarse para ver si usted 
aprendió las palabras del cuarto de baño que usted estudió en el 
ejercicio anterior, el cuarto de baño - palabras. ¿Safir - 
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 4 - cómo 
usted vive?</string>
          </description>
